title: Byggnadsarbetaren
text:
Byggnadsarbetaren is the official magazine of the builders union. The magazine was established in 1949. It is published eight times a year and based in <a href="Stockholm">Stockholm</a>, <a href="Sweden">Sweden</a>. As of 2015 Kenneth Pettersson was the <a href="editor-in-chief">editor-in-chief</a> of the magazine.
In 2012 the circulation of "Byggnadsarbetaren" was 108,300 copies.
